segments.text: Do you drive a car yourself ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes , I just bought new car , I drive to work everyday !
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Great ! When you become new driver , you are better drive as carefully as possible !
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Sure , I see safety is most important thing ! Accident is awful ! I will take your advice !
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Besides , traffic signal in downtown area are very annoying , are they ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes , definitely ! You can't drive freely !
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Now , we are out of the town , you can drive freely !
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Compare with speaking , yes ! But things are not good as you expecting !
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Can you see that road side help ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Yes , We are going to across real road .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: That's right . We have to slow down again . If we haven't meet the passing tree , we have to stop a car away .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: What other signs what we see in road area like this ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: There are a plenty of signs such as Watch for children !
segments.speaker: S2
